item.title: [GROOVY-8436] IOException "Stream closed" occurred when rebuilding Apache Groovy in IntelliJ IDEA
item.description:
It seems that `loader.getResourceAsStream("META-INF/dgminfo")` of `org.codehaus.groovy.reflection.GeneratedMetaMethod.DgmMethodRecord#loadDgmInfo` failed to find the "META-INF/dgminfo" file, which should be generated correctly by `task dgmConverter` in gradle script.
When the file is read, IOException "Stream closed" occurred.(Reproduce the issue: Menu "Build" -> Menu item "Rebuild Project" in IntelliJ IDEA).
